messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant with access to tools. When the user asks you to fetch web content, use the webfetch tool.
Fetch the content from https://api.github.com/users/github and tell me the username

function.name: webfetch
function.description: Fetches content from a URL and returns it as text

url.description: The URL to fetch content from

prompt.description: The prompt to run on the fetched content
